meanings.definition: The act of covering an area with grass or turf.
meanings.sent1: The lawning of the backyard made it a perfect spot for picnics.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the lawning process because it makes the yard look neat and green.
meanings.sent3: After a long day of lawning, I realized I had missed a spot near the tree.
meanings.sent4: The lawning of the park transformed it into a lush green paradise.
meanings.sent5: The lawning of the field was so well done that it felt like walking on a soft carpet.

meanings.definition: The process of maintaining a lawn.
meanings.sent1: Regular lawning involves mowing, watering, and weeding the grass.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor takes pride in their lawning and always keeps their lawn looking pristine.
meanings.sent3: I never thought lawning could be so time-consuming until I started taking care of my own yard.
meanings.sent4: The lawning work never seems to end, but the result is always worth it.
meanings.sent5: Proper lawning requires dedication and attention to detail to keep the grass healthy and green.

meanings.definition: The area of land covered with grass or turf.
meanings.sent1: The lawning in the park is perfect for playing outdoor games with friends.
meanings.sent2: The lawning around the house provides a nice space for children to play.
meanings.sent3: The lawning in the front yard looked even greener after the rain.
meanings.sent4: The lawning in the meadow stretched out as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The lawning in the backyard was a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of the city.
